DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate visual function AcrySof Toric AcrySof Natural Intraocular Lenses ( IOLs ) follow implant replacement cataract .
DOC.brief_title: Visual Function After Bilateral Implantation AcrySof® Toric
DOC.criteria: Bilateral cataracts 40~80 year age 4 Days 1 Week interval single patient 's surgery dilate pupil size ( dim light ) ≥ 4.0 mm Anticipated correction IOL +10 Diopters ~ +25 Diopters 0.75 2.0 Diopters astigmatism preoperatively measure Keratometry reading Preoperative ocular pathology Previous intraocular corneal surgery An increase risk complication could require vitreoretinal surgery Corneal irregularity Corneal opacity Current contact lens usage ( within 6 month prior first surgery )
